com.adeptions.clarguments.converters

Class OnOffBooleanConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adeptions.clarguments.converters.OnOffBooleanConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentValueConverter<java.lang.Boolean>

    public class OnOffBooleanConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArgumentValueConverter<java.lang.Boolean>
    Utility value converter for converting raw "on"/"off" values to boolean

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public java.lang.Boolean convert(int tokenPosition,
                                 java.lang.String rawValue,
                                 Argument argument,
                                 ArgName specifiedArgName)
                          throws BadArgException
        Convert the raw incoming arg value string to the appropriate type
        Specified by:
        convert in interface ArgumentValueConverter<java.lang.Boolean>
        Parameters:
        tokenPosition - the position of the token (in original args[])
        rawValue - the raw string arg value
        argument - the argument for which the value was found
        specifiedArgName - the name by which the argument was specified
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Throws:
        BadArgException - if the conversion fails
